Package com.robototes.math

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robototes.math.MathUtils
  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A bunch of helpful math utilities for programming a robot
    Author:
    Eli Orona

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  MathUtils.MathFunction
      A class that can compute complex functions on a single value.

      • map

        public static double map​(double value,
                         double minInputValue,
                         double maxInputValue,
                         double minOutputValue,
                         double maxOutputValue)
        Parameters:
        value - The value to map
        minInputValue - Lower bound of the input range
        maxInputValue - Upper bound of the input range
        minOutputValue - Lower bound of the output range
        maxOutputValue - Upper bound of the output range
        Returns:
        The value mapped from the input range to the output range

      • runFunction

                                   MathUtils.MathFunction function)
        Runs a MathFunction on a list of values, allowing for easier ways to manipulate many values
        Parameters:
        input - The list of values
        function - The function to compute with the values
        Returns:
        The outputs of the function
